entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is referred as 'stupid' by the narrator.

entities.name: blast-ended skrewt
entities.description: Blast-Ended Skrewt is mentioned as a friendly creature.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts and has a past that the narrator wants to know about.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is mentioned as someone Dumbledore had a duel with in the past.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Grindelwald had a legendary duel in the past.
